utilities.description: Respective scores for each candidate. Total number of records must match candidates.

candidates.description: Set from which the Exponential mechanism will return an element. Total number of records must match utilities.

name: exponential_mechanism

privacy_usage.description: Object describing the type and amount of privacy to be used for the mechanism release. Length of privacy_usage must be exactly one.

return.description: Element from the candidate set selected via the Exponential mechanism.

description: Returns an element from a finite set with probability relative to its utility.
